zove.ppcg.tankwar

Interface Tank

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RandomMoveTank, RandomShootTank

    public interface Tank
    Represents a tank. All tanks must have a
    static {
        Control.registerTank(MyTankClass.class)
    }
     at the top of their class
    Author:
    Zove Games

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getName()
      Returns this tank's name
      void onDestroyed(Battlefield field, boolean won)
      Called when your tank dies.
      void onSpawn(Battlefield field, MapPoint position)
      Called when your tank spawns on the battlefield.
      TurnAction onTurn(Battlefield field, MapPoint position, float health)
      Called on each of this tank's turns to recieve a TurnAction for this tank Create a TurnAction with
      TurnAction.createNothingAction(),
      TurnAction.createShootAction(float), or
      TurnAction.createMoveAction(zove.ppcg.tankwar.TurnAction.Direction, int)
      void turnFeedback(MapPoint newPosition, FieldObjectType hit)
      After a tank returns a TurnAction on their turn, this method is called to provide feedback for that action

    • Method Detail

      • onSpawn

        void onSpawn(Battlefield field,
           MapPoint position)
        Called when your tank spawns on the battlefield. Perform init tasks here, if necessary
        Parameters:
        field - The current battlefield, complete with all obstacle and tank positions
        position - The tank's current position

      • onTurn

        TurnAction onTurn(Battlefield field,
                MapPoint position,
                float health)
        Called on each of this tank's turns to recieve a TurnAction for this tank Create a TurnAction with
        TurnAction.createNothingAction(),
        TurnAction.createShootAction(float), or
        TurnAction.createMoveAction(zove.ppcg.tankwar.TurnAction.Direction, int)
        Parameters:
        field - The current battlefield, complete with all obstacle and tank positions
        position - The tank's current position
        health - The tank's current health
        Returns:
        The current action your tank wants to take. If null, it evaluates to TurnAction.createNothingAction()

      • turnFeedback

        void turnFeedback(MapPoint newPosition,
                FieldObjectType hit)
        After a tank returns a TurnAction on their turn, this method is called to provide feedback for that action
        Parameters:
        newPosition - The tank's new position (may not be changed)
        hit - What the tank hit, if it decided to shoot
        See Also:
        FieldObjectType

      • onDestroyed

        void onDestroyed(Battlefield field,
               boolean won)
        Called when your tank dies. Perform cleanup tasks here, if necessary.
        Parameters:
        field - The battlefield
        won - Did this tank win the round?

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns this tank's name
        Returns:
        This tank's unique name
